CONVERSATION.SELECT_A_CONVERSATION: Please select a conversation from left pane
CONVERSATION.404: Sorry, we cannot find the conversation. Please try again
CONVERSATION.UNVERIFIED_SESSION: The identity of this user is not verified
CONVERSATION.NO_MESSAGE_1: Uh oh! Looks like there are no messages from customers in your inbox.
CONVERSATION.NO_MESSAGE_2: to send a message to your page!
CONVERSATION.NO_INBOX_1: Hola! Looks like you haven't added any inboxes yet.
CONVERSATION.NO_INBOX_AGENT: Uh Oh! Looks like you are not part of any inbox. Please contact your administrator

SEARCH.TITLE: Search messages
SEARCH.PLACEHOLDER: Type any text to search messages

CONVERSATION.NOT_ASSIGNED_TO_YOU: This conversation is not assigned to you. Would you like to assign this conversation to yourself?
CONVERSATION.TWILIO_WHATSAPP_CAN_REPLY: You can only reply to this conversation using a template message due to
CONVERSATION.UNSUPPORTED_MESSAGE_FACEBOOK: This message is unsupported. You can view this message on the Facebook Messenger app.
CONVERSATION.UNSUPPORTED_MESSAGE_INSTAGRAM: This message is unsupported. You can view this message on the Instagram app.

CHANGE_PRIORITY.SUCCESSFUL: Changed priority of conversation id {conversationId} to {priority}
CHANGE_PRIORITY.FAILED: Couldn't change priority. Please try again.

AGENT_ASSIGNMENT.FAILED: Couldn't assign agent. Please try again.

LABEL_ASSIGNMENT.FAILED: Couldn't assign label. Please try again.

TEAM_ASSIGNMENT.FAILED: Couldn't assign team. Please try again.

FOOTER.MSG_INPUT: Shift + enter for new line. Start with '/' to select a Canned Response.
FOOTER.PRIVATE_MSG_INPUT: Shift + enter for new line. This will be visible only to Agents
FOOTER.MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_NOT_CONFIGURED: Message signature is not configured, please configure it in profile settings.

REPLYBOX.DRAG_DROP: Drag and drop here to attach

UNDEFINED_VARIABLES.TITLE: Undefined variables
UNDEFINED_VARIABLES.MESSAGE: You have {undefinedVariablesCount} undefined variables in your message: {undefinedVariables}. Would you like to send the message anyway?

CONVERSATION.VISIBLE_TO_AGENTS: Private Note: Only visible to you and your team
CONVERSATION.FILE_SIZE_LIMIT: File exceeds the {MAXIMUM_SUPPORTED_FILE_UPLOAD_SIZE} MB attachment limit
CONVERSATION.MESSAGE_ERROR: Unable to send this message, please try again later

CONTEXT_MENU.LINK_COPIED: Message URL copied to the clipboard

DELETE_CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

EMAIL_TRANSCRIPT.TITLE: Send conversation transcript
EMAIL_TRANSCRIPT.DESC: Send a copy of the conversation transcript to the specified email address
EMAIL_TRANSCRIPT.SEND_EMAIL_SUCCESS: The chat transcript was sent successfully
EMAIL_TRANSCRIPT.SEND_EMAIL_ERROR: There was an error, please try again

FORM.SEND_TO_CONTACT: Send the transcript to the customer
FORM.SEND_TO_AGENT: Send the transcript to the assigned agent
FORM.SEND_TO_OTHER_EMAIL_ADDRESS: Send the transcript to another email address

EMAIL.ERROR: Please enter a valid email address

ONBOARDING.TITLE: Hey ðŸ‘‹, Welcome to {installationName}!
ONBOARDING.DESCRIPTION: Thanks for signing up. We want you to get the most out of {installationName}. Here are a few things you can do in {installationName} to make the experience delightful.

ALL_CONVERSATION.TITLE: All your conversations in one place
ALL_CONVERSATION.DESCRIPTION: View all the conversations from your customers in one single dashboard. You can filter the conversations by the incoming channel, label and status.
ALL_CONVERSATION.NEW_LINK: Click here to create an inbox

TEAM_MEMBERS.TITLE: Invite your team members
TEAM_MEMBERS.DESCRIPTION: Since you are getting ready to talk to your customer, bring in your teammates to assist you. You can invite your teammates by adding their email addresses to the agent list.
TEAM_MEMBERS.NEW_LINK: Click here to invite a team member

LABELS.TITLE: Organize conversations with labels
LABELS.DESCRIPTION: Labels provide an easier way to categorize your conversation. Create some labels like #support-enquiry, #billing-question etc., so that you can use them in a conversation later.

CANNED_RESPONSES.TITLE: Create canned responses
CANNED_RESPONSES.DESCRIPTION: Pre-written quick reply templates help you quickly respond to a conversation. Agents can type the '/' character followed by the shortcode to insert a response.
CANNED_RESPONSES.NEW_LINK: Click here to create a canned response

UPDATE.ERROR: Unable to update attribute. Please try again later

ADD.TITLE: Add
ADD.ERROR: Unable to add attribute. Please try again later

DELETE.ERROR: Unable to delete attribute. Please try again later

TRANSLATE_MODAL.TITLE: View translated content
TRANSLATE_MODAL.DESC: You can view the translated content in each langauge.
TRANSLATE_MODAL.NO_TRANSLATIONS_AVAILABLE: No translations are available for this content
